title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Detailed documentation of the project requirements is required. This should include the supported cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP), comprehensive security policies (access control, data encryption, compliance standards, etc.), integration specifications with existing systems such as identity management, logging, monitoring, and user interface requirements. Also, consider scalability, performance, and other relevant requirements. Additionally, clarify the degree of customizability for the platform to meet various client needs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and communication between the different modules.

title: Develop Cloud Integration Module
description: Implement the module responsible for integrating with different cloud environments and retrieving security-related data.

title: Develop Policy Management Module
description: Implement the module for defining, managing, and enforcing security policies across cloud environments.

title: Develop Centralized Dashboard
description: Implement the web-based dashboard for monitoring, configuring, and managing security across multiple cloud environments.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing security policies, configurations, and audit logs.

title: Implement Security Auditing and Reporting
description: Develop the module for auditing security configurations, detecting violations, and generating reports.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application across different environments.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage

title: Conduct Security Testing and Hardening
description: Perform comprehensive security testing, including penetration testing, and implement necessary security hardening measures.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user guides, tutorials, and training materials to assist users in effectively using the SecureMultiCloudManager platform.

title: Perform End-to-End Testing and Validation
description: Conduct comprehensive end-to-end testing, including functional, integration, and performance testing, to validate the entire system.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Deploy to Production and Monitor
description: Deploy the SecureMultiCloudManager platform to the production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms.
